blocks.title: Buy multiple crypto assets at once
blocks.description: Buy upto 15 crypto assets at once, in the form of bubl's that are either currated by experts or custom made.

blocks.title: Invest into researched backed themes
blocks.description: Strategies that are suggested by experts for a basket of crypto assets that maximize your returns while minimizing your losses.

blocks.title: Create your own bubl's
blocks.description: Invest into your own themes or ideas by creating bubl's which hold upto 15 crypto assets.

blocks.title: Keep track of your investments, anytime, anywhere
blocks.description: Track and manage seemlesly with realtime exchange values, review your portfolio anytime using your phone or web dashboard.
